If you want to upgrade your equipment, you've come to the right place. I'll tell you how you can do it. Remember it well!
Upgrading Equipment

1. Only items that can be upgraded are shown in the Equipment Upgrade window. 2. Choose what you want to upgrade. 3.The list of the required materials will be shown. 4. Below the requirements you will see the result of your upgrade. 5. To initiate the process press the button "Upgrade" 6. Soul Crystal enhancement, enchanting and attribute bonuses remain the same, as well as all appearance modifications. 7. The item's enchant value stays the same or decreases depending on the item grade.
